Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: ஏமுற் றவரினும் ஏழை தமியனாய்ப் பல்லார் பகைகொள் பவன்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: He who is alone and incurs the hatred of many is more infatuated than even mad men.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A man stands alone on a small, isolated pillar ('தமியனாய்'). He is arrogantly provoking everyone around him, making many enemies ('பல்லார் பகை கொள்பவன்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Surrounding his pillar is a vast, angry mob of people, all glaring at him with hatred. Below him, for comparison, is a pit containing a gibbering madman ('ஏமுற்றவர்').
Layered_Composition.Background: The man on the pillar is depicted as being in a far more dangerous and foolish position than the actual madman. His isolation and the universal hatred he has earned make him the poorer, more wretched figure of the two ('ஏழை').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The person who, while all alone, makes an enemy of everyone is more wretched and madder than a madman.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The man on the isolated pillar surrounded by a sea of hate is the central image. The comparison to the actual madman below serves to show who is in the worse, more foolish state.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Isolated, arrogant, foolish, in extreme danger.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A harsh, lonely spotlight is on the man on the pillar. The surrounding mob is a sea of angry, red-tinged faces. The madman in the pit is in a dim, pathetic light.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A high-angle shot that emphasizes the man's isolation and the overwhelming number of his enemies.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a focus on the crowd's angry expressions.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Symbolic realism, with a sense of impending doom.

Cultural_Anchors: Alone, with many enemies ('தமியனாய்ப் பல்லார் பகை கொள்பவன்')
